job_title: Data Analyst with Azure Snowflake and Power BI
jd: Sr. Data Analysts having strong experience in data identification and querying with standard relational and non-relational systems, along with strong knowledge of Structured and Unstructured Data. Strong Data Profiling and SQL skills to analyze the source-target data identification and generate Source – Target Mapping Sheets (STTM). Working experience in big data environments on both on-prem and cloud, such as Azure and Snowflake and reporting tools like Power BI skills Grid: Skill Level (Advance, Intermediate, beginner) Years of experience Self-Ratings out of 10 Data Identification, Querying, cleaning, wrangling, checking quality Data Profiling SQL Skills (Query, Stored Procs etc.) Exp in Big Data Env Azure Snowflake Power BI
